title: A Special Announcement (Ep 1271)
description:
In this episode I address the continued media misinformation campaign about the protests and the Wuhan virus. I also address the hiding of this key Spygate player, and the potential reasons why. I also discuss this enormous threat to policing in America. 

News Picks:

There’s going to be a massive brain drain in America’s police departments. 


The hapless WHO is now changing their minds, AGAIN, on the Wuhan Virus. 

Los Angeles City Council member, who is advocating to cut the LAPD budget, had a security detail for herself.

The kettlebell shortage of 2020!
